project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that fetches and displays the current weather information for a specified city using a public weather API.

task.name: Set up the Python environment and install necessary libraries
Choose a public weather API and review its documentation for integration
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the API
Implement the function to parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the display function to print the weather information in the terminal
Write unit tests for the fetching and parsing functions
Execute tests to ensure accurate functionality of fetching and displaying features
